issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Instances do not go into "running" state after launch

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
I noticed that on the shared QA setup in region-one (EDGE mode) the instances that I was trying to launch  were never going into "running" state and were stuck in "pending" state for a  while and then go into "shutting-down" state. I found out that the instances were being launched on a NC that was in "notready" state.
{code}
NODE  two  10.111.1.117  notready    
INSTANCE  i-f1bf5110      
INSTANCE  i-af557394      
INSTANCE  i-73eb3d6c   
{code}

fields.summary: When NC is in "notready" state the cloud still tries to use it to launch instances
